profileBanner.headline: AI & Full Stack Developer
profileBanner.profileSummary: Passionate AI and Full Stack Developer with experience in AI-driven applications, immersive learning, and full-stack solutions. Skilled in Python, Java, C#, SQL, Flask, FastAPI, and AWS.

contactMe.name: Harsh Pramod Bachhav
contactMe.title: AI & Full Stack Developer
contactMe.summary: Developer focused on AI, immersive learning, and scalable full-stack applications. Experienced in creating innovative solutions and working with diverse technologies.

projects.title: TE Connect CV Dashboard
projects.description: Developed TE Connect CV Dashboard streamlining TE’s recruitment pipeline, including resume parsing, job posting, applicant tracking, and interview automation.

projects.title: Chalo On Tour AI Itinerary App
projects.description: Built AI Itinerary App reducing itinerary generation time by 90% and API costs by 95%, enabling personalized travel plans.

projects.title: SQL to Neo4j Aura Migration & Graph Explorer
projects.description: Migrated PostgreSQL database to Neo4j Aura and built React app enabling natural language to Cypher query conversion and graph visualization.

projects.title: SpheraTech Immersive Learning
projects.description: AI-driven immersive learning platform using UE5, MetaHuman, AWS, and Pixel Streaming. Integrated NLP, 3D Gaussian splatting, and text-to-speech.
projects.techUsed: UE5, MetaHuman, AWS, NLP, Pixel Streaming

projects.title: GeoRiskAccess: Risk Factor Prediction
projects.description: Built with Flask and Random Forest (89% accuracy) for pollution and health risk analysis. Optimized pipeline reducing computation by 40%.

projects.title: AI Personal Hub (MCP)
projects.description: Local MCP server integrating Local Files, GitHub, YouTube, Gmail, Steam, and a Summarizer into a unified assistant with LM Studio and Flask UI.
